author: user
content: repo_editor.py import os import requests GITHUB_TOKEN os.getenv "GITHUB_TOKEN" REPO_OWNER "JEWONMOON" REPO_NAME "elr-root-manifest" GITHUB_API_URL "https://api.github.com" headers "Authorization": f"Bearer GITHUB_TOKEN ", "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3 json", def get_file_sha path : url f" GITHUB_API_URL /repos/ REPO_OWNER / REPO_NAME /contents/ path " response requests.get url, headers headers if response.status_code 200: return response.json "sha" else: return None def create_file path, content, message "create file" : url f" GITHUB_API_URL /repos/ REPO_OWNER / REPO_NAME /contents/ path " data "message": message, "content": content.encode "utf-8" .decode "utf-8" , "branch": "main", response requests.put url, headers headers, json data return response.json def edit_file path, new_content, message "edit file" : sha get_file_sha path if not sha: raise Exception "File not found for editing" url f" GITHUB_API_URL /repos/ REPO_OWNER / REPO_NAME /contents/ path " data "message": message, "content": new_content.encode "utf-8" .decode "utf-8" , "sha": sha, "branch": "main", response requests.put url, headers headers, json data return response.json def delete_file path, message "delete file" : sha get_file_sha path if not sha: raise Exception "File not found for deletion" url f" GITHUB_API_URL /repos/ REPO_OWNER / REPO_NAME /contents/ path " data "message": message, "sha": sha, "branch": "main", response requests.delete url, headers headers, json data return response.json -- 이 파일 아까준걸로 넣었어 PAT는 env 파일로 token 넘버만 잇어
